title: BRIEF-Cynata Therapeutics Says Fujifilm Granted License To Commercialise Co's Product
text:
BRIEF-Cynata Therapeutics Says Fujifilm Granted License To Commercialise Co's Product

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Sep 17, 2019 21:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cynata Therapeutics Says Fujifilm Granted License To Commercialise Co's Product Sept 17 (Reuters) - Cynata Therapeutics Ltd : * CYNATA THERAPEUTICS - FUJIFILM GRANTED EXCLUSIVE, WORLDWIDE LICENSE TO DEVELOP & COMMERCIALISE CO'S LEAD MESENCHYMAL STEM CELL PRODUCT, CYP-001 * CYNATA THERAPEUTICS - CYNATA WILL RECEIVE US$3 MILLION CASH FROM FUJIFILM AS AN UPFRONT FEE UNDER TRANSACTION * CYNATA THERAPEUTICS- CO WILL POTENTIALLY RECEIVE ADDITIONAL PAYMENTS FROM FUJIFILM OF UP TO US$43M BASED ON ATTAINMENT OF CERTAIN MILESTONES * CYNATA THERAPEUTICS - CO WILL RECEIVE A 10% ROYALTY ON ALL FUTURE PRODUCT SALES IF LICENSED PRODUCT IS SUCCESSFULLY COMMERCIALISED IN ANY COUNTRY

BRIEF-Cynata Therapeutics Says Fujifilm Granted License To Commercialise Co's Product
description: BRIEF-Cynata Therapeutics Says Fujifilm Granted License To Commercialise Co's Product
